item.title: 最新消息：美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据出口民调分析预测，乔-拜登将赢得密西西比州的民主党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Joe Biden will win the Democratic primary in Mississippi, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the exit poll. https://t.co/pBhfZ8Egn3 pic.twitter.com/8DxFMOWztE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国广播公司（ABC）新闻报道，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）已获得足够的代表票数，将获得民主党总统候选人提名。

item.title: 兰尼-克拉维茨（Lenny Kravitz）正式获得好莱坞星光大道上的一颗星。这位摇滚名人堂提名者周二在洛杉矶好莱坞大道上举行的仪式上获得了这一殊荣。
item.description:
Lenny Kravitz officially has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame nominee was honored Tuesday during a ceremony on Hollywood Boulevard in Los Angeles.https://t.co/4NcYVv0tEm pic.twitter.com/tkERUCCJMG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普的律师在一份法庭文件中表示，他将不会在本月晚些时候的封口费审判中援引正式的 "律师建议 "辩护。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump will not invoke a formal "advice of counsel" defense in his hush money trial later this month, his lawyers signaled in a court filing.https://t.co/2XfUhgnnYU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 根据周二下午提交的一份命令，刘易斯-卡普兰（Lewis Kaplan）法官已批准唐纳德-特朗普在专栏作家 E. Jean Carroll 提起的诽谤案中缴纳 9163 万美元的保证金。
item.description:
Judge Lewis Kaplan has approved Donald Trump's $91,630,000 bond in the defamation case brought by columnist E. Jean Carroll, according to an order filed Tuesday afternoon.https://t.co/V7IiACtBPM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 华盛顿初选中的 "无党派 "选民希望继续就以色列在加沙的战争向拜登总统施压。

item.title: 纽约喷气机队四分卫亚伦-罗杰斯（Aaron Rodgers）和前明尼苏达州州长杰西-文图拉（Jesse Ventura）在小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
item.description:
New York Jets quarterback Aaron Rodgers and former Minnesota Gov. Jesse Ventura top the list of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s potential running mates.

item.title: 社交媒体上发布的画面显示，SpaceX 公司的 "龙 "太空舱载着四名宇航员在结束为期六个月的国际空间站任务后返回地球。
item.description:
Footage posted to social media shows the SpaceX Dragon capsule returning to Earth with four astronauts on board after they concluded their six-month mission on the International Space Station. https://t.co/HDtrt5weVL pic.twitter.com/NwOB0SEvB6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，刑事转介可能成为陷入困境的拜登弹劾调查的 "退出策略"。

item.title: 纽约喷气机队四分卫亚伦-罗杰斯（Aaron Rodgers）和前明尼苏达州州长杰西-文图拉（Jesse Ventura）在小肯尼迪的潜在竞选伙伴名单中名列前茅--尽管这位独立候选人尚未向两人发出正式邀请。

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 马萨诸塞州当局表示，经过长达数天的搜捕，一名涉嫌枪杀一名母亲及其 11 岁女儿的嫌犯已被拘留。阅读更多
item.description:
After a dayslong manhunt, a suspect has been taken into custody in the fatal shooting of a mother and her 11-year-old daughter in Massachusetts, authorities said.

Read more: https://t.co/FocAoMxoGh pic.twitter.com/ZxEuspZxZm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 即使随着加密货币和点对点支付的出现，伪造美国纸币的活动仍在继续。以下是 "怪钱 "如何继续影响世界经济：
item.description:
Even with the advent of cryptocurrency and peer-to-peer payments, counterfeiting of U.S. paper currency remains an ongoing enterprise.

Here's how "funny money” continues to impact the world's economy: https://t.co/9NEl6MZvPY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 由于对乌克兰的新援助自 12 月以来一直在国会停滞不前，白宫周二宣布已凑齐另外 3 亿美元的军事援助作为权宜之计。
item.description:
With new aid for Ukraine stalled in Congress since December, the White House on Tuesday announced it had cobbled together another $300 million in military assistance to use as a stopgap measure. https://t.co/8QW2K3VG9K

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在对詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）非故意过失杀人罪的审判过程中，法庭播放了一段此前未公开的视频，视频显示，就在牛津校园枪击案发生几小时后，他在执行搜查令之前告诉警察在他家中的什么地方可以找到枪支。
item.description:
Previously unseen video was shown in court during James Crumbley's involuntary manslaughter trial of him telling police where to find guns in his home prior to a search warrant being executed, just hours after the Oxford school shooting. https://t.co/GdjDiPZQfY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: .@AnneKFlaherty从弗吉尼亚州纽波特纽斯报道美军部署任务，在加沙地带外海建造码头，通过海路运送救援物资。
item.description:
.@AnneKFlaherty reports from Newport News, Virginia as U.S. troops deploy on mission to build a pier off the Gaza Strip to deliver relief and supplies by sea. https://t.co/yZiuDyR3yo pic.twitter.com/ovBxlfF96q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国国会众议院将于周三对一项两党法案进行投票，该法案规定，如果中国所有者不出售TikTok，美国将禁止使用这款广受欢迎的社交媒体应用：
item.description:
The House is set to vote Wednesday on a bipartisan bill that would ban the wildly popular social media app TikTok in the U.S. if its Chinese owners don't sell the app.

Here's how a possible ban could play out: https://t.co/qUbjBLcMIN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普在为自己处理机密材料辩护的同时，再次对拜登总统处理机密文件的行为提出不实指控。
item.description:

item.title: 吉斯兰-马克斯韦尔（Ghislaine Maxwell）周二请求联邦上诉法院推翻对她的定罪和 20 年监禁的判决，因为她招募和诱导未成年少女，这些少女遭到杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的性虐待。
item.description:
Ghislaine Maxwell asked a federal appeals court on Tuesday to overturn her conviction and 20-year prison sentence for recruiting and grooming underage girls who were sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein. https://t.co/IUQ2KaMJ6g pic.twitter.com/UmPWY7AX01

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统特朗普说，如果他当选连任，他的第一件事就是 "释放 "因在1月6日美国国会大厦袭击事件中的角色而被定罪的人，特朗普继续声称这些人是 "被错误监禁的"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump says one of his first acts if elected to a second term would be to "free" people convicted for their roles in the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, whom Trump continues to claim are "wrongfully imprisoned." https://t.co/5tnccZdNb2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 官员们说，一名雪崩预报员上周在俄勒冈州东部滑雪时引发雪崩，不幸身亡。这名预报员和一位朋友周三在群山（Gunsight Mountain）越野滑雪时引发了雪崩。
item.description:
An avalanche forecaster died in a snowslide he triggered while skiing in eastern Oregon last week, officials said.

The forecaster and a friend were backcountry skiing on Gunsight Mountain on Wednesday when the avalanche was triggered. https://t.co/CNQzaKArvR pic.twitter.com/3AjiRaW64M

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 密歇根州一名男子因被幽灵枪套件制成的枪支击中而失去右眼，他对意外击中他的前朋友和出售该套件给他朋友的宾夕法尼亚州公司提起诉讼。
item.description:
A Michigan man who lost his right eye after being shot with a firearm made from a ghost gun kit filed a lawsuit against his former friend who accidentally shot him and the Pennsylvania company that sold his friend the kit. https://t.co/AhpBhUmgB2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 已经宣布不再寻求连任的共和党众议员肯-巴克宣布将于下周末离开国会。

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）都很有可能在周二获得足够的代表席位，从而获得各自党派的提名，届时四个州和一个地区将公布选举结果。
